website_summaries.verdict: Keds sure knows how to launch a winning design, and it’s no wonder since it’s one of the oldest brands out there. The baseball-themed design of Keds Kickstart Pennants is eye-catching and something new, and many users agree. The shoes also boast of a comfy construction, a high-quality make, and a perfect fit width-wise. Add a very low price point into the mix, and you’ve got one heck of a deal.
pros: Keds Kickstart Pennant sneakers are comfortable right out of the box, many users claimed
The shoes have a fun and sporty style that several purchasers liked
Some reviewers stated that the fit (width) of the shoes are just right
Plenty of customers remarked that they loved taking their Keds Kickstart Pennant fashion sneakers to baseball games, and they earn a lot of compliments there
The shoes are very well-made, a couple of consumers noted
These lifestyle kicks are well worth the money, some individuals reported
One buyer was pleased with how it easy it was to clean these sneakers from the Ked’s low-top range
cons: The Pennant variation of the Keds Kickstart shoes run big, according to several testers

customer_reviews.title: Loved them on line, but hard to wear live
customer_reviews.text: I loved them. I wore them in London to the MLB series at London Stadium. Many compliments. BUT ... they destroyed my feet in hours with tightness and blisters. total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! So cute but hurt so bad!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are so cute, I almost kept them just to wear to baseball games. However, as soon as I put them on, I literally said out loud, "Ouch!" The tongue has a very stiff leather "keds" patch on there that caused it to dig into the top of my foot. Additionally, they were big on me and rubbed my heal when I walked. No way I could wear these. So sad! Keds, please redesign these so I can wear them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: many compliments...from women and men
customer_reviews.text: ordered a 9. should have order 1/2 size up. toe box narrow. kept the 9's. still comfortable, better arch support than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shanghai'd

customer_reviews.title: Grerat product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wife who is a huge baseball fan. Everytime she wears them everyone ask where did you get them. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom, she loves them so far. The only down fall is the part between the laces is kinda tall so goes up farther then the shoe when wearing them. Other then that nice shoes
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Run BIG but are very well made
customer_reviews.text: Torn on what rating to give. Ordered my normal size and they were too big. I put insoles in them and they seemed fine. They KILLeD my heels and rubbed blisters. On the flip side they are absolutely adorable and I received so many compliments. They seem Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: TaraDL

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are awesome, fit great and even have a 2nd pair ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are awesome, fit great and even have a 2nd pair of brown laces that are super cute. However, the shoe box arrived in a bag not a shipping box. Arrived by delivery car (Uber maybe) and was totally crushed. Not a prob because I don't anticipate a return but thought the seller might want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes but shoe collar needs breaking in.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first pair, I'm a size 10M and the shoes were too small at the toe cap. Went larger and am ok with the extra room - thicker pair of cotton socks will do the trick. The heel collar though on both shoes rubs against the skin. Try to work out the issue. Definitely would get blisters if no protection - that's why I gave four stars. Really cute shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Elsner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box! Will attend their first Giants game soon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: SO STINKING CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in my normal size 6.5 and they fit well. There is enough room for a sock. Very comfortable and so so cute! I liked the brown laces the best. The brown really sets them off from looking like just another pair of white tennis shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jetco

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but stiff heels.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but stiff heels. I get lots of compliments on these but the heel feels tall and stiff. It cuts into the back of my Achilles. I may try a heel cushion to lift my foot a bit and see if that helps. I like them and want them to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Shoes Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! I am a baseball mom, and buy anything baseball related. I work on my feet and have worn them all day today and my feet aren't a bit tired! I love them! They are absolutely great and cute as can be! P.S. Ordered them while waiting to have surgery... glad I wasn't clear under before I paid! They were a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Boles

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Had a pair just like them many years ago and wore them till they fell apart (a couple of years). Fit great, look great! We may not have much of a baseball season but I’ll have the shoes when we do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect shoe -
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel, the style, the comfort of this shoe so much that I just bought a second pair. I have had the first pair for two years and I wear them 3 times a week. They are still in great shape., I just wanted another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Play ball!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I received several compliments. I agree that the heel cuts in and could cause blisters but I wore no-show socks for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes! They fit perfectly. The only problem I had is I washed them with a little soap and water they turned yellow and bluish dont know why : (
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! Loved that it came with 2 different sets of laces.
customer_reviews.author: Cockersox

customer_reviews.title: Fun Baseball Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love wearing these sneakers to my son's baseball games. They are comfy, true to size and very well made. I have received compliments from other baseball moms. They are fun and sporty and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Super cute and comfortable. I get compliments on them all the time. I’m a size nine and they fit really well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big baseball fan and I love these sneakers. Get lots of compliments. I bought a size up so I can use orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my daughter. She loves them and can't wait to go to a ballgame this summer to wear them at the appropriate event.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Cute- but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great- but are not comfortable at all. The shoe doesn't bend real well- causing discomfort. Wore them to a MLB baseball game by then end of the night my feet were killing me. Going to try and wear them for short periods at a time until they break in.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin mom

customer_reviews.title: Get these!! Summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Keds!!!! Beautiful, Beautiful, fit great, fun, fun, fun, Keds!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They’re very cute. I have only tried them on though since I bought them for my sons baseball games and covid ruined the season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute - A little big
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest shoes ever. I wear them to every baseball game. My only complaint is that they do run a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I love these tennies!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are narrow and these are a bit narrower than the standard medium width so they fit perfectly. Also love the extra pair of tan laces. Cute, cute, cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look cool
customer_reviews.text: This will be gift for my granddaughter who plays softball. I’m sure she will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R. Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! They are great quality materials, they look great and are super comfortable. I did use Scotchguard to protect them because they are a canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tennis shoe love the baseball style even though I can’t go to a game this Summer
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Schlee

customer_reviews.title: Hey baseball fans !
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers!!! The detail is awesome ! If you are a baseball fan you need these!
customer_reviews.author: ECR

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love them!!! Super cute. Receive compliments every time I wear them. True to size. Highly recommend.... buy the shoes! :)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nicer in person
customer_reviews.text: Fit good, but they need to be broken in before you decide to wear them all day for a tournament. The back of the shoe hurts a little.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Keds!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these tennis shoes resemble a baseball. Really cute red stitching on the side that resembles a baseball. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Ok but would order up a size in the future. Cute design and style.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for ball moms!
customer_reviews.text: I do love them, just need to find good socks for them by they left blisters.
customer_reviews.author: country girl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love theses shoes can’t wait for opening day to break these babies out! I like the two sets of laces included. I have size 8 long narrow feet these fit perfect. No pinching in the toes and didn’t slide on my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with these. My son plays ravels baseball and I’m that “extra” mom on the sidelines so these are perfect for me ♥️
customer_reviews.author: kisandra Williams

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! Love, love these shoes. Great fit, well made, super cute and so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute cute cute
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new shoes. I received so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Randi S. Buslik

customer_reviews.title: “Baseball Mom” loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My “baseball mom” wife loves the shoes and wears them proudly while supporting our 10U son’s club team!
customer_reviews.author: GBrtncn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Love,Love,Love these shoes. They fit great and I have received a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Boy mom

customer_reviews.title: Take me out to ball park!
customer_reviews.text: Very good pair of shoes. Perfect for an afternoon at the ball park.
customer_reviews.author: Marion J Gamez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every time I go to a baseball game wearing these, I get non-stop compliments :)
customer_reviews.author: DAFNEE ROSALES

customer_reviews.title: Very cute & comfy
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like the baseball shoes, but I have to wear them with socks since the heal cuts into my heal
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I love my baseball themed sneakers! They look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm ready to walk to/from/around the stadium in my new shoes! Super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kristina  Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Look like a baseball Mom
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and wonderful to wear at my son’s baseball game.
customer_reviews.author: ARABRAB

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Comes with 2 sets of shoe strings, brown and white so you can match with your outfit 😊

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect! Wearing them to all games this summer!

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer than most Keds.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most Keds, these are pretty stiff and take some wearing-in.

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have been wanting them for awhile now.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! The shoes are too cute, and very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Keds baseball shoes
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. Just in time for baseball season.

product_meta.title: Keds womens WF57167 Kickstart Pennant
feature_bullets: durable rubber outsole for added comfort
